SlayByDay:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
SlayByDay:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

SlayByDay:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
SlayByDay:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
SlayByDay:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

SlayByDay:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
SlayByDay:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

SlayByDay:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
SlayByDay:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !SlayByDay:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

SlayByDay:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
SlayByDay:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !SlayByDay:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
